name: orientEar
tagline: Ear Trainer - tech project for Tonmeister course
body:
orientEar will be a browser-based ear trainer, taking advantage of HTML5 and the Web Audio API, building upon the work done on BeaqleJS. It is being developed by Andy Normington as a Technical Project (final technical assessment) for the [Tonmeister](http://www.tonmeister.co.uk) course at the Institute of Sound Recording, University of Surrey.

The project is still in early development - a demo will be available soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
